title: Day of AI curriculum meets the moment
summary: MIT Responsible AI for Social Empowerment and Education (RAISE) celebrated the second annual Day of AI with two flagship events. The event aimed to teach kids of all ages and backgrounds the basics and responsible use of artificial intelligence. Over 8,000 people from 108 countries participated in the event, which included workshops, discussions on human rights and data policy, and hands-on activities. The event emphasized the importance of addressing ethical concerns and ensuring that AI is used for the benefit of all. The program was also adapted in Australia, reaching 85,000 students in secondary schools.
